title: PBE Forum

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello everybody,
I can't write,comment and reporting bug on the PBE forum. Throws me this error:

> **Must be level 1 or higher to create a discussion **

look at the picture.Â¨

Thank you for solving the problem
**Major Uroxxman (Left Four Erox)**

_sorry for the bad English_


Edit: My main account is on the Turkey server even if I'm from CZ.

replies.body:
I went ahead and poked that PBE account on our end, go ahead and try posting over there now. Normally you'd be able to post here to push a sync through like I just did, but you can't exactly do that with a PBE account =\ . I gotcha back though

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thanks, I can comment on forum!
